Articles.Content:
I was playing around with USI's MKS, and I decided that I liked the mod and would like to install some more. After installing FTT, I checked back into the game and saw that the tab with all of the MKS stuff had gone missing, and I had no way of getting the parts. I have them researched, but I simply do not have access to the menu to get to them. Everything worked just fine until I installed FTT, and even during that install I had to delete two parts from the mod to even get my game to boot.

KSP: 1.0.4 Linux Ubuntu 64bit

Mods Installed:

USI FTT

USI MKS

All the Near Future Stuff

All mods are up to date as of this posting.

Edited September 25, 2015 by ShaheDH1671

The same thing is happening to me. I had to fully reinstall KPS and CKAN and now I cant access the kolonization tab.
That is because FTT uses a different version on USITools. Try copying the USITools folder from MKS and see if that fixes it
